conclusion: Need to determine the velocity of ball B on the inclined plane.
The photograph has a 1:1 scale relationship with the actual object.
The distance between points A and B is 20 cm.
The distance between points B and C is 15 cm.
Velocity of ball B can be calculated using the formula: Velocity = Distance/Time.
Substituting the given values: Velocity of ball B = 15 cm / 0.1 s = 150 cm/s.
The velocity of ball B is 150 cm/s.
